trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around July 7th 2004
divs: sighting detailsi was heading east on e 100 s in lafayette, indiana. the time was about 1:40am. i saw a bright yellow\gold light in the sky about a quarter of a mile ahead on the left. i kept driving until the lights were directly on my left. i then rolled down my window and stopped the car. there were a couple of lights underneath the object and two or three that were very bright spot lights. the object was in the back yard of the house that is located on the corner of e 100 s and s 500 e. the object had no sound and did not move. the object hovered above tree level. the object was in rocks-throw distance. i kept on driving and the light continuously shone towards me wherever i went. i then proceeded home. i came back the next day to see if there was anything that would explain the object or lights and there was absolutely nothing.
Summary: Driving home and discovered object with bright lights in rocks-throw distance - no sound - lights shone on me wherever I drove.
